ygData.messageBody:
Clerics do.

Name: Wave of Fear.
Level: 24.
Mana: 90.
Class: Alteration.
Vendor: Cleric Guild.
Approx Spell Cost: 11pp 9gp 5sp 9cp.
Researchable: No.
Type: Crowd Control Spell.
Actual Effects:Area Effect: Fear.
Description:This spell will cause all enemies immediately surrounding you to
run away for a short period of time

> From: "JasonF" <jasonf@...>
>

> Do *any* other classes have AE Fear? I don't think so.

> I lack 4 bubbles to 50. :-)
>
> [49 Bard] Crier (Half Elf) <Seekers of Norrath> ZONE: work

Bleh, 8 bubs for me and a dragon and 2 planes trips before that. <sigh>

Sylly
